trans-unit.source: Draws ink on a surface as the user moves the tablet pen.

The DynamicRenderer class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> class, and allows ink to be rendered to a surface as the user moves the mouse pointer with a tablet pen or other pointing device.

You can use the DynamicRenderer to dynamically render ink on a custom control, or inherit from DynamicRenderer to perform custom rendering in real time on an ink-enabled element, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
Dynamic rendering is done on a thread separate from the application's user interface thread when the user inputs ink with a tablet pen.
When a mouse is used, dynamic rendering is done on the UI thread.

> [!NOTE] > In order to reference this class as a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element, you must map the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns?displayProperty=fullName> CLR namespace to a prefix, and use that prefix to qualify the DynamicRenderer element.
For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that specifies the appearance of the rendered ink.
## XAML Text Usage This property is not typically used in XAML.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that specifies the appearance of the rendered ink.
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> for the rendering thread.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> for the rendering thread.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> is added to an element.
Draws the ink in real-time so it appears to "flow" from the tablet pen or other pointing device.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object onto which the stroke is rendered.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that represents the segment of the stroke to draw.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the path of the mouse pointer.
A Brush that specifies the appearance of the current stroke.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.DrawingAttributes*> property changes.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled*> property changes.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput*> property changes.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref> is removed from an element.
Occurs on a thread in the pen thread pool when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.

To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor enters the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually entered the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen actually left the bounds of the element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs on a pen thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on a pen thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput"></xref> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> method
The object that the application passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Clears rendering on the current stroke and redraws it.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> redraws the current stroke and any of the stylus points passed into the Reset method.
This method allows you to redraw a stroke while the user is still creating the stroke.
The tablet pen must be touching the digitizer or the left mouse button must be pressed when Reset is called.
The current stylus device.
The stylus points to be redrawn.
Neither the stylus nor the mouse is in the down state.
Gets the root visual for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>.

When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>, you must attach the RootVisual property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> method.
The root <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>.
